fulltext:
TRINH DUY THANH 
Java Software Engineer 
SUMMARY 
• 
I am a 5 years experienced software engineer, graduated from University of Information 
Technology - National University - HCMC. My strength points are self-motivated, positive and 
active attitude. I would like to take challenges, have ability to catch up with new technologies in a 
short of time. In additional, I am friendly, well organized, well cooperated and agile. 
• 
Core Responsibilities: 
- 
Design, implement, integrate and support applications from Java, Mobile (IOS/Android). 
- 
Create documents that specify strategy, assessment, or design. 
- 
Work directly with team members in Australia, India, Germany, US, Spain to understand 
requirements by using English. 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
• 
Programming Languages: Java, C/C++, HTMLs, Javascript, Objective-C, Swift. 
• 
Frameworks/ Platforms: J2EE, EJB, JPA, Hibernate, Android, IOS, AngularJS, 
ReactJS 
• 
Database Management Systems: MySQL, SQL Server, SQLite. 
• 
IDEs: Eclipse, Netbean, Xcode. 
• 
Operating Systems: Windows XP/ Window 7/ Window 8/ Window 8.1/ Ubuntu/ Mac 
OS. 
• 
Foreign Languages: English. 
• 
Soft Skills: Presentation, Communication, Self-studying. 
1 
• 
Others: UML, Maven, Enterprise Architecture Tool, SVN, Git, Pencil, Gradle. 
EDUCATION BACKGROUND 
• 
2010 - 2015 University of Information Technology – Vietnam National University 
Bachelor of Software Engineering 
WORK EXPERIENCES 
1/2018 – Now 
Developer at VNG Corporation 
• 
Project Description: ZaloPay is payments app for mobile platform that aims to tap 
into the new era of mobile-based financial services that merges social media, payments 
and mobile. 
• 
Responsibilities: 
- 
Be part of backend team 
- 
Involve implementing new adapter to call directly to bank system while integrating 
new bank into ZaloPay app 
- 
Involve implementing new features. 
- 
Involve bug fixing and updating documents. 
• 
Technologies/Frameworks: Angular 5, Spring boot, Spring Security, Spring 
Data, MongoDB, MySql, Java 8, Redis, Hazelcast, JWT, ReactJS, AngularJS 
4/2017 – 1/2018 
Developer at ASWhite Solutions 
• 
Project Description: Maintaining and implementing new features for Guild’s 
Insurance system as offshore team 
• 
Responsibilities: 
- 
Involve implementing new features to support new requirements. 
- 
Involve maintaining current systems (Systems and Portal are built from Guidewire’s 
framework, Spring, AngularJS) 
2 
- 
Be part of onshore team in Australia (joining sprint plaining meeting, sprint review 
and retrospective meeting, scrum daily meeting and other activities) 
• 
Technologies/Frameworks: Java, Spring, Gosu, AngularJs, Javascript, 
Bootstrap, HTML5, CSS3 
10/2015 – 3/2017 
Developer at TMA Solutions 
• 
Project Description: Building a web application that can manage ClearOne's 
products, such as: Audio/Video decoder/encoder, Amplifiers, Control & Source Interfaces. 
• 
Responsibilities: 
- 
Involve implementing the frontend/backend functions 
- 
Involve designing test specifications and documentation 
- 
Involve communicating with customers in US to get project’s information 
• 
Accomplishment: High appreciation of customers, worked as onsite in US to 
work directly with customers. 
• 
Technologies/Frameworks: Java, VertX, AngularJs, Javascript, Bootstrap, 
HTML5, CSS3 
9/2016 – 3/2017 
Developer at TMASolutions 
• 
Project Description: An mobile application for both IOS and Android platform. This 
application is used for controlling ClearOne product - Timpanogos Converge Pro 2. 
Application can make VOIP, Telco call, notify incoming call, take actions with call, manage 
phone book, and manage connections to Converge 2 Pro box. 
• 
Responsibilities: 
- 
Involve implementing UI - Android/IOS 
- 
Involve implementing UI business - Android/IOS 
- 
Involve implementing shared Library in C++ 
• 
Technologies/Frameworks: IOS, Objective-C, Android, Java, C++, SQLite 
3 
6/2016 – 12//2016 
Developer at TMA Solutions 
• 
Project Description: An mobile application for both IOS and Android platform. This 
application is used for sending message, sharing files, images, videos and documents, creating 
meeting schedules, making Voip calls. 
• 
Responsibilities: 
- 
Involve implementing UI - Android/IOS 
- 
Involve implementing UI business - Android/IOS 
- 
Work onsite with team in Spain 
• 
Technologies/Frameworks: IOS, Objective-C, Android, Java, C++ 
10/2015 – 6/2016 
Developer at TMA Solutions 
• 
Project Description: An web application that help user to work with Alcatel-Lucent's 
NEs. It's named "Taskcenter" - the web version of Alcatel-Lucent 5520 Access Management 
System (AMS) 
• 
Responsibilities: 
- 
Involved implementing the frontend/backend functions 
- 
Involved fixing bugs 
- 
Involved implementing new features 
• 
Accomplishment: TMA Quarterly IV/2015 Star Performers - Task Center Team 
of AXS 
• 
Technologies/Frameworks: Java, Spring, RestEasy, JBoss, AngularJs, Javascript, 
Bootstrap, HTML5, CSS3, Angular Material. 
6/2015 – 10/2015 
Developer at TMA Solutions 
• 
Project Description: An Eclipse RCP application - "Alcatel-Lucent 5520 Access 
Management System (AMS)" 
• 
Responsibilities: 
4 
- 
Involved fixing bugs 
- 
Involved improving UTs 
- 
Involved implementing new features 
• 
Accomplishment: "Feature with Zero Bug", high appreciation of customers 
• 
Technologies/Frameworks: Java, Spring, JMS, JMX, Hibernate ,JBoss, Eclipse 
RCP 
2/2014 – 5/2015 
Developer at Robert Bosch Engineering and Business Solutions Vietnam 
• 
Project Description: An J2EE web application for booking lab car for testing 
• 
Responsibilities: 
- 
Involved implementing new UI 
- 
Communicate directly with French and German customers to get the new requirements 
and feedbacks 
- 
Involved developing, maintaining functions, solving technical issues 
- 
Involved designing test specifications and documentation 
• 
Accomplishment: High appreciation of customers 
• 
Technologies: Java, EJB, JSP, Javascript, JQuery, HTML5 
5/2014 – 12/2014 
Developer at Robert Bosch Engineering and Business Solutions Vietnam 
• 
Project Description: An J2EE web application for booking requests supporting 
company’s internal request 
• 
Responsibilities: 
- 
Involved developing, maintaining functions, solving technical issues, etc. 
- 
Involved designing test specifications and documentation. 
• 
Technologies: Java, EJB, Maven, Hibernate, JSF, Primefaces 
5
